doesItHurt.question: Does the treatment hurt?
doesItHurt.answer: Most patients experience minimal discomfort. We use topical numbing cream and advanced techniques to ensure your comfort throughout the procedure.

howLongResults.question: How long do results last?
howLongResults.answer: Results typically last 12-18 months, though this varies by individual. Many patients choose maintenance treatments to preserve their results.

whenSeeResults.question: When will I see results?
whenSeeResults.answer: Initial results are often visible within 2-4 weeks, with full results developing over 6-12 weeks as your body's natural healing processes take effect.

canCombine.question: Can I combine this with other treatments?
canCombine.answer: Yes, this treatment can be effectively combined with other procedures for enhanced results. Dr Abbas will discuss complementary options during your consultation.

downtime.question: Is there any downtime?
downtime.answer: There is minimal to no downtime. Most patients return to normal activities immediately, though we recommend avoiding strenuous exercise for 24-48 hours.

isSafe.question: Is the treatment safe?
isSafe.answer: Yes, the treatment is very safe when performed by qualified practitioners. Dr Abbas is GMC registered and our clinic is CQC certified, ensuring the highest safety standards.

consultationProcess.question: What happens during the consultation?
consultationProcess.answer: During your consultation, Dr Abbas will assess your concerns, discuss your goals, explain the treatment options, and create a personalized treatment plan. The consultation fee is redeemable against treatment.

lookNatural.question: Will I look natural or overdone?
lookNatural.answer: Natural-looking results are our priority. Dr Abbas follows the philosophy of 'enhanced, not changed' â€” you'll look like the best version of yourself, not someone different.

lookFrozen.question: Will I look frozen or expressionless?
lookFrozen.answer: No. Dr Abbas uses precise techniques that preserve natural facial movement and expression while reducing lines and wrinkles.

brandDifference.question: What's the difference between product brands?
brandDifference.answer: We use premium FDA-approved products like Juvederm and Restylane. Dr Abbas will recommend the best product for your specific needs based on treatment area and desired results.

pregnancySafe.question: Is it safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
pregnancySafe.answer: We do not recommend aesthetic treatments during pregnancy or breastfeeding as a precautionary measure. Please wait until after this period to undergo treatment.

exerciseAfter.question: How soon can I exercise after treatment?
exerciseAfter.answer: We typically recommend resting for 24-48 hours, then gradually returning to activity. High-impact exercise should be avoided for 1-2 weeks depending on the treatment area.

insteadOfSurgery.question: Can this replace surgery?
insteadOfSurgery.answer: In many cases, regenerative treatments can help avoid or delay surgery. Dr Abbas will assess whether you're a suitable candidate and discuss realistic expectations.

howManyTreatments.question: How many treatments will I need?
howManyTreatments.answer: Most patients see significant improvement after 1-3 treatments. Dr Abbas will create a personalized treatment plan based on your condition severity and goals.

insuranceCover.question: Is this covered by insurance?
insuranceCover.answer: Some private health insurance policies cover regenerative treatments. We recommend checking with your provider. We can provide documentation to support your claim.

privacy.question: How is my privacy protected?
privacy.answer: Your privacy is our absolute priority. All consultations are completely confidential, we use discreet billing, and our private Wimpole Street clinic ensures discretion.

needToUndress.question: Do I need to undress for the treatment?
needToUndress.answer: Treatment requirements vary, but we ensure your comfort and dignity at all times. Dr Abbas will explain exactly what to expect before your appointment.

intimacyAfter.question: How soon can I be intimate after treatment?
intimacyAfter.answer: We typically recommend waiting 24-48 hours before intimate activity. Dr Abbas will provide specific aftercare instructions based on your treatment.

partnerKnow.question: Will my partner know I've had treatment?
partnerKnow.answer: Results are natural-looking and gradual. While your partner may notice positive changes, the treatment itself is not obvious unless you choose to share.

workForMe.question: Will this treatment work for my type of hair loss?
workForMe.answer: Results vary based on the cause and stage of hair loss. Dr Abbas will assess your scalp during consultation and recommend the most effective treatment approach for your situation.

permanentResults.question: Are the results permanent?
permanentResults.answer: Hair regeneration treatments stimulate natural regrowth which can be long-lasting with proper maintenance. Most patients benefit from annual top-up treatments.

whenSeeGrowth.question: When will I see new hair growth?
whenSeeGrowth.answer: Initial improvements in hair quality are often noticed within 4-6 weeks. Significant new growth typically becomes visible around 3-6 months as hair follicles regenerate.
